celebrate.who: Who do you want to celebrate ?
celebrate.parity: There is currently {pctMen}% men and {pctWomen}% women on the Pantheon. Let's try to maintain a gender parity !
celebrate.why: Why do you want to celebrate {name}
celebrate.explain: Let us know briefly why that person is special to you and why you'd like to add them to the Pantheon.
celebrate.warning: Please provide both the name and the URL of any reference.

moreabout.title: About Open Pantheon
moreabout.text: We all have inspirational figures in our personal pantheon, but there is no place to share who they are and why they have impacted our lives. Open Pantheon empowers individuals and organisations to honour their personal heroes, celebrate their impact and share their legacy with like-minded people across the world.
